title: Stories Kids Learn From: 19 Short Stories for Growing Kids
description: You have discovered the best short stories you can find anywhere!Join loving animal and human characters on grand adventures through space and time. Some of these short stories are cute, some are scary, and some are adventurous, once you start reading you won't be able to stop!Grandparents and their grandchildren love reading these stories together!**19 Stories for the price of 1!!! Scroll up and click "Buy Now" to get your copy!**
author: Betty J. Byers
